abstract: “America’s Got Talent” delivered Tuesday night’s largest audience in prime time as 12.8 million viewers tuned in to the 9 p.m. reality series, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: “America’s Got Talent” delivered Tuesday night’s largest audience in prime time as 12.8 million viewers tuned in to the 9 p.m. reality series, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: “America’s Got Talent” delivered Tuesday night’s largest audience in prime time as 12.8 million viewers tuned in to the 9 p.m. reality series, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Tuesday Ratings: Another Win for NBC’s ‘Talent’
